Articles.Content:
I'm unable to play KSP due to memory protection error.

When I start game in console the last thing I see is: "Importing game controller configs" 

Set current directory to /home/"USERNAME"/.local/share/Steam/steamapps/common/Kerbal Space Program
Found path: /home/"USERNAME"/.local/share/Steam/steamapps/common/Kerbal Space Program/KSP.x86_64
Mono path[0] = '/home/"USERNAME"/.local/share/Steam/steamapps/common/Kerbal Space Program/KSP_Data/Managed'
Mono path[1] = '/home/"USERNAME"/.local/share/Steam/steamapps/common/Kerbal Space Program/KSP_Data/Mono'
Mono config path = '/home/"USERNAME"/.local/share/Steam/steamapps/common/Kerbal Space Program/KSP_Data/Mono/etc'
displaymanager : xrandr version warning. 1.5                                                                                                                                                                      
client has 4 screens                                                                                                                                                                                              
displaymanager screen (0)(DVI-D-0): 1920 x 1080                                                                                                                                                                   
Using libudev for joystick management                                                                                                                                                                             
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
Importing game controller configs                                                                                                                                                                                 
Naruszenie ochrony pamięci

Hi @Fernir, please see this thread.

 

We'll need to know your system information, but as the display manager is throwing a warning before any Squad code has started it's likely your GPU and driver are the issue, and they are preventing the Unity engine from starting.
